transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan Sandeep ji aashirwad karao niwas se.
Executive: Boliye
Customer: Hello sir ji ye na call isliye kar raha tha.
Executive: Haan boliye
Customer: Ek aapke against mein na buyer ne complaint raise kari hai.
Executive: Ye kaun sa buyer hai?
Customer: Ye sir ke O6 karke hai O A S I X karke Renko naam Renko jagah se hai shayad ye koi.
Executive: Hello
Customer: To inke aapne shayad koi product vagera inko bheja tha.
Executive: Hmm
Customer: Joki damage product unhe receive hua tha.
Executive: Hmm
Customer: 15000 ka amount tha aapka jo tha.
Executive: Hmm
Customer: Theek hai. To aisa kuch hua tha kuch problem vagera face hui thi aapka kuch agar aapko yaad hai.
Customer: Mujhe to aisa kisi ne kuch bheja nahi.
Customer: Company ka naam kya bole Rainbow?
Executive: O6
Customer: O A S I X O A S I X
Customer: Number mil sakta hai sir?
Executive: Number vagera to nahi hai sir mere paas bhi idhar yaha pe complaint raise hui hai to mai isliye call kar raha tha aapko ki mai ek bar confirm kar lu.
Customer: To number to chahiye nahi to mai kaise communicate karunga unse hazaro log phone karte hai kaha se.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye rukiye mai bata raha hu kya kya hai inke paas se kuch hai detail vagera.
Executive: Complaint few month ago have new phone complaint company O6 karke koi company hai naam bhi dekh leta hu kya hai.
Executive: Ek minute
Executive: Dipum Sheti naam se koi hai ye. Naam yaad hai sir aapko kuch Dipum Sheti.
Customer: Haan achha achha achha achha kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: Haan
Executive: Inne shayad aapke kuch product vagera kharida tha 15000 ki amount tha inko wo damage nikla hai shayad inka product.
Customer: Theek hai IndiaMART se to mujhe call mujhe call karega abhi dekhiye hum log jo invoice bechte hai na invoice mein clear hum log koi bhi dispute ho ya damage ho wo teen din se char din working days ke andar aapko complaint karni padegi. Inhone missing liya aapka char panch mahina to kam se kam ho gaya theek hai.
Executive: Haan unhone abhi koi to hame
Customer: Haan wo to bahut der bahut din pehle mai bata deta hu iska inka detail ek second sir.
Executive: Haan
Executive: Dipum Kumar Kshetri inhone 12 June ko liya tha. Matlab June July August September October November panch mahina ke upar ho gaya sir.
Customer: Achha nahi inhone yahi kehna hai inka mai bata deta hu aapko inka ye kehna hai ki inhone aapke khilaf shayad complaint pehle bhi raise kari thi kuch mahine pehle lekin inhe koi response nahi mila tha to keh rahe hai ki I have new phone so I need my money back help me with it matlab unhone shayad phone vagera change kiya hai.
Customer: Wo jhoot jhoot bol raha hai mujhe do din pehle hi unhone whatsapp kiya tha ke sir mujhe raw material lena hai.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan haan boliye
Customer: Unhone just do do din pehle mujhe whatsapp kiya tha mere paas whatsapp mein hai detail unhone whatsapp kiya tha machine unhone machine unhone mujhse liya tha abhi unka kehna hai ke sir mujhe raw material lena hai ab raw material ka sara jo photo catalog hai mujhe whatsapp kariye. Maine hamara raw material ka sara photos photos unko whatsapp kar diya theek hai unke baad unka koi response nahi aaya abhi sun raha hai complaint kiya theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to sir aapke paas kuch hai detail vagera invoice vagera aapke paas?
Customer: Unka invoice to hai hi wo to jab mal liye the tabhi ka invoice hai aur do din pehle jo mujhse raw material ka catalog manga tha tabhi to unhone mujhe koi complaint ho kuch bhi ho unka machine chal raha hai tabhi to koi raw material ke liye bol raha hai na.
Executive: Haan haan to chaliye ek kaam kariye aap mujhe agar detail share kar sakte hai to aap mujhe whatsapp pe mai number bata deta hu aap ek bar share kar dijiye mai ek bar check karwa lunga jo bhi aapki hai na ticket close karwa dunga.
Customer: Theek hai sir number boliye.
Executive: 87
Executive: Sorry
Executive: 87
Executive: 87
Executive: 916
Executive: 916
Executive: 20
Executive: 20
Executive: 485
Executive: 485 8791620485
Customer: Ji ji yahi hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai inhone jo mal purchase kiya tha unka invoice aur inhone recent mujhe jo message kiya aur maine jo reply kiya screenshot leke bhej raha hu theek hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai sir mai ye jo hai aapka solve karwa deta hu jo bhi issue hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay thank you.
Customer: Ji
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyer raised a complaint about damaged product.

- Customer states buyer contacted him recently for material.



Resolution:

- Executive requested customer to share details on WhatsApp.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, damaged product, raw material, whatsapp, invoice

seller_categories.mcat_name: Use And Throw Pen Making Machine
